LakeFlow

GitHubGet Started
LakeFlow is free and open source. Self-host in minutes.

Data Lake pipelines for RAG & AI

Ingest raw files, process into chunks, embed with sentence-transformers, and store in Qdrant. Semantic search API and embedding endpoint for RAG, LLM, and analytics.

pipx run lakeflow init

or

Get Started

Everything you need for Data Lake & RAG

Ingest, process, embed, and search. One pipeline for RAG, LLM, and analytics.

üìÅ

Layered Data Lake

Zones: 000_inbox ‚Üí 100_raw ‚Üí 200_staging ‚Üí 300_processed ‚Üí 400_embeddings ‚Üí 500_catalog. Hash, dedup, and catalog.

üîç

Semantic Search

Query in natural language. Results by cosine similarity. Qdrant vector store with configurable collection.

üß¨

Embedding API

POST /search/embed for text‚Üívector. Compatible with external RAG/LLM services. Sentence-transformers support.

üéõÔ∏è

Streamlit Control UI

Run pipelines, explore data lake, test search. Multi‚ÄìQdrant support. Dev mode for Pipeline Runner.

üê≥

Docker-first

Backend, frontend, Qdrant via Docker Compose. No Python install on host. Mac M1 venv for GPU (Metal/MPS).

üêç

Python & FastAPI

Built with Python 3.10+, FastAPI, sentence-transformers, and Qdrant. Easy to extend and integrate.

Solutions for every use case

From side projects to production. LakeFlow adapts to your Data Lake and RAG needs.

For Developers

Integrate LakeFlow with your Python stack. REST APIs, Docker, and clear data lake structure.

Quick Start ‚Üí

For Data Teams

Ingest documents, run pipelines, and expose embedding/search APIs for RAG and LLM applications.

Documentation ‚Üí

Enterprise

Self-host on your infrastructure. NAS-friendly (SQLite without WAL). Full control over data.

Built for developers

Get started in minutes. Python-first. Use the tools you already love.

Scaffold a new LakeFlow project with one command and run with Docker.

pipx run lakeflow init
